name: mail-handler.yml
configuration:
spring:
  jackson:
    serialization:
      fail_on_empty_beans: false
    deserialization:
      # dates came from Actitvit as timestamp im milliseconds, so disable nanoseconds
      read_date_timestamps_as_nanoseconds: false
  jmx:
    default-domain: my-app-mail-jmx
  application:
    name: nttm-mail-handler
  mail:
    host: exht.rt.ru
    username: nttm_incident@rt.ru
    password: Ru48ueHc
    port: 25
    properties.mail.smtp:
      writetimeout: 5000
      timeout: 5000
      connectiontimeout: 5000
  rabbitmq:
    host: rabbitmq-6260
    username: admin
    password: admin
    inbox_email_queue: inbox_email
    send_email_queue: send_email
    listener:
      simple:
        acknowledge-mode: none
management:
  endpoints:
    web:
      path-mapping:
        prometheus: metrics
      base-path: /
      exposure:
        include: prometheus
  health.solr.enabled: false
logging:
  config: classpath:log4j2-dev.yaml
  level:
    org.hibernate: error
    org.hibernate.SQL: error
    org.zalando.logbook: info
logbook:
  format:
    style: http
  exclude:
    - "**/metrics"
